comment: Main text block containing Chinese characters, likely from a classical dictionary or lexicographical work, with annotations in small script. Includes entries such as '色' (color), '印' (seal), '卯' (the third Earthly Branch), and definitions using phonetic and semantic components (e.g., '从人', '从卩'). The layout is vertical, right-to-left, typical of traditional Chinese printing. Marginal notes include '大十二', '兑文七二', '唐文', indicating page or section markers.
